business_description: Merec Industries, founded in 1998, is the largest wheat miller in Mozambique, producing corn and wheat flour, pasta, biscuits, and animal feed. The company serves the Mozambican and South African markets and has a processing capacity of 1.0 million MTpa.
transactions: Invictus Investment Company acquired Merec Industries, adding over USD 272 million to its consolidated revenues and enhancing its operational capabilities in the agro-food sector.
